text: Yɛlɛmali be farikolo dilan na yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla.
translated_text:
Bamanankan: Tiriki kɛrɛ saba lamununa ni kɔgɔji ye: Kɔgɔji Eze tilebin fɛ, Kɔgɔjinfin kɔgɔdugu fɛ ni Kɔgɔji Mediteranɛn worodugu fɛ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bamanankan: Yɛlɛmali be farikolo dilan na yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla. 
English: The submarines were very slow and had very limited range.
clean_output: The submarines were very slow and had very limited range.

Bamanankan: Tiriki kɛrɛ saba lamununa ni kɔgɔji ye: Kɔgɔji Eze tilebin fɛ, Kɔgɔjinfin kɔgɔdugu fɛ ni Kɔgɔji Mediteranɛn worodugu fɛ. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bamanankan: Furakɛlikɛlalaw y'a daminɛ ka ta baara la Fangamasa Augustus fɛ wa u ye Roman Furakɛlikɛli Baarakɛbolo fɔlɔ sigi senkan min tun kakan ka baarakɛ kɛlɛ kɔfɛ.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Bamanankan: Kɛlɛ in daminɛ la u tun be taama fanba kɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ,  nka tuma minna jateminɛn-mansin yiriwala ka jaw jɛ jijukɔrɔkurunw jagoyala ka don jijukɔrɔ walasa k'u yeli bali. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Bamanankan: Apia ye Samoa faba ye. Dugu be Upolu gun sanfɛ ani a mɔgɔ be dɔni dɔrɔn mɔgɔ 40.000 duguma. 
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The capital is Upolu and the population is just over 40,000.
clean_output: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The capital is Upolu and the population is just over 40,000.
